channel.title: How 2 change starting gear
channel.description: hey, how can i change starting gear :P some help on this please

item.title: How 2 change starting gear
item.dc:creator: @snakeman2058 snakeman2058
item.description:
@snakeman2058 wrote:

how would i do this in testscape? cause i dont have that. mine says playerEquipment[playerHat]=Item.randomHat();

Read full topic

item.title: How 2 change starting gear
item.dc:creator: @Joachim2k1k Joachim2k1k
item.description:
@Joachim2k1k wrote:

go player.java

search playerEquipment[playerHat]=

there u have it

example :

	playerEquipment[playerHat]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=		-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=		-1;

-1 is nothing

like… if i want to start with a blue phat… do

	playerEquipment[playerHat]=		1042;

Read full topic

item.title: How 2 change starting gear
item.dc:creator: @Ziexxx Ziexxx
item.description:
@Ziexxx wrote:

Its simple really all you really all you need to do is go to:
Start menu: My documents: Go up to tools: view: hidden files and folders: apply…
Then click the address bar and type in C:/ go to program files and look for Moparscape
Go into the file click hybridscape: characters click on your account and then find
your equipment and edit it!!!

Read full topic
